pr_title: SourceExists HLRC uses GetSourceRequest instead of GetRequest

timeline.message:
SourceExists HLRC uses GetSourceRequest instead of GetRequest

Ref #50885

timeline.bodyText: In the es code base we prefer use == false instead of !. The reason is that this is more visible when reading the code. A ! can easily be missed or forgotten to be added.
timeline.author: martijnvg

replies.bodyText: thanks for the clarification! fixed it.
